item.title: The Sifting
item.description: At the moment I have one special prayer in my heart and that is, that I might say something that would give assurance and encouragement to those who stand in need of it, which is all of us.

item.title: We Have Made Covenants with the Lord
item.description: If what I say should need a title, it would be “We Have Made Covenants with the Lord—Let Us Keep Them.”

item.title: Power Over Satan
item.description: I am thankful, my brothers and sisters, for the truth that has been revealed through prophets of God, both in the past dispensations and in the present. We are blessed with ample truth regarding our origin, our mortal lives, and our destiny.
